name: SatScout
desc: Satellite data tracking public and private oil and gas operator activity in key US shale basins.
full_ticker_coverage: All public and private E&Ps operating in the aforementioned basins
full_sector_coverage: US Onshore E&P activity for Permian, Eagle Ford, and Haynesville basins
pricing_structure: Pricing is based on number of operators desired and frequency of delivery & updates
why_us?: SatScout provides fast frac updates for production forecasting, well cost est.
advantages: Compared to competing sources, SatScout provides well-level updates on a weekly basis for public operators. We inform our clients of well-level activity on average 105 days ahead of when that activity is reported.
use_cases: Used for production forecasting, estimating well costs & CAPEX trends
